LanguageData.PlasticBasic.label: plastic basic
LanguageData.PlasticBasic.description: Lightweight bio-plastic from plant materials. Basic-grade material suitable for simple furniture and structures.
LanguageData.PlasticIndustrial.label: plastic industrial
LanguageData.PlasticIndustrial.description: Advanced bio-plastic with enhanced durability. Industrial-grade material for high-quality furniture and robust structures.
LanguageData.PlasticFiber.label: plastic fiber
LanguageData.PlasticFiber.description: Synthetic textile fiber from bio-plastic. Suitable for clothing production and textile crafting.
